text_block_list.text: It's now been a while since I've become Espoir City's trainer. Today, it's the first day of summer training camp.

text_block_list.name: Prudent Student
text_block_list.text:
Good work today, Espoir! 
I brought you some curry!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Thanks. You got a good head on those shoulders, don'tcha?

text_block_list.name: Sincere Student
text_block_list.text: Espoir, I brought you some natto, seaweed, and pickled vegetables.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: O-Oh… these don't go together at all, girl…

text_block_list.name: Careless Student
text_block_list.text: Espoir, I got you some pepper steak with carrots and yogurt on the side!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: I don't need all this crap! How much do you think I eat, dammit?!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Can it already! They're just pains in my ass, that's all.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Whew… thanks to those three clowns, my stomach's about to explode, seriously.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Hehe… aight! 'S about time to get ready for traini—

text_block_list.name: School Staff
text_block_list.text: Oh, is that you, Espo? We need to talk.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Urk, it's the fuzz… tch, not another lecture.

text_block_list.name: School Staff
text_block_list.text: I just wanted to thank you for showing the new students around. They all told us about how kind and caring you were as an upperclassman.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Wha—? O-Oh, yeah…

text_block_list.name: School Staff
text_block_list.text: I hope to see more of this side of you in the future, too. Well, good luck on your training today.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: …I actually got praised by one of the guidance counselors? Haha, this is insane.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: But it's not like I actually wanted to do all'a that crap. It was all them who—

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: …Meddling in my business as always, huh?
After breakfast, we're supposed to start training for the day, but…

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Uuughhh…

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Shut up! It's nunya beeswax!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: (Dammit, not again! That's not what I wanted to say at all!)

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: (Wait, then… what do I want to say, exactly? 'Lookin' for a fight, punk?!' No, that's not it… it's more like…)

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: (Ugh, damn it all! Why the hell am I so worked up about this?!)

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: (Oh! Wait, that's right! Actions speak louder than words, don't they?)

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: (Lemme just write it in the sand real quick. Lessee… T-H-A-N-K…)

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: (Wait, no! 'Ur pretty useful ig' is probably fine…)

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Hey, you! 
C'mere a sec.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: So, um… look at this.
(Sploosh!)

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Ah?! A-All my hard work…
choice_data_list: Um… is there something in the sea, or…?
Um… is there something in the sea, or…?

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, yeah, whatever! 
Look at the big ol' sea for all I care!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Well, night's here, and I couldn't get a single word out to 'em.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Why the hell am I so twisted up over this? 
It's not like I ever asked them to do all that for me!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Augh, dammit, dammit, dammit! 
But, I still…!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: (It's not like it was a one-time thing. Somehow they ended up… like… doin' a whole bunch for me…)

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: I get that already! But how am I supposed to tell them…

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Tell them… I'm grateful?

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: That means y'gotta buy at least one or two souvenirs to send home, got it?! They sell pretty much anythin' in this mall, so it ain't hard.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Hm… guess I oughta give it a try too, huh?
Espoir City has been in a bad mood today ever since we started training. I'm wondering if it's because she's worn out from all the activities, when…

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Hey… hey!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: C'mere a sec.
Perplexed though I am, I follow her to the beach.
choice_data_list: (Is that… a watermelon? And a bat?)

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: So. If you… tried to split that watermelon, I wonder what would happen, yeah?

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: J-Just shut up and hit the damn watermelon! I went and bought it myself, and it's a real good one, okay?!
I'm still clueless, but Espoir City ties a bandana around my eyes for me. On the already-dim beach, I blindly try to split the watermelon, now in total darkness.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Where are you goin', dumbass?! To the right! No, not your right, my right!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Woah, woah, why the hell're you going in the ocean?! There's a jellyfish like thirty centimeters from you! Get outta there!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Ooh?! That's good, right there is perfect! Go for it!
(Bam!)
I lift the bandana, and the perfectly split watermelon is laying in front of me— along with what appears to be a letter.
"Thx for everything"

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Urghhh… "Everything" means "everything", and "thx for" means "thanks for" obviously, you dumbass!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Or do you not know what "thanks for" and "everything" means, somehow?! Do I gotta teach you the alphabet next or what?!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Anyway, I don't need you here anymore! Enjoy your watermelon n' go home already! I'm out!
With that, Espoir City storms off the beach, leaving just me and the watermelon in the moonlight.
She's awkward till the very end.
